title: wrist and ankle force torque sensors

content.raw:
Enable wrist and ankle force torque sensors for Atlas robot.  See pull request #74.

Note this breaks if using gazebo 1.2, so we should add the patch to 1.2 as well.

This is not really a gazebo style sensor, but a way to fill in data needed by the Atlas wrist and ankle force torque sensor in a model plugin.  For real gazebo style force torque sensor, stay tuned to [this ticket](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/379/create-a-force-torque-sensor).
content.html:
Enable wrist and ankle force torque sensors for Atlas robot. See pull request #74.

Note this breaks if using gazebo 1.2, so we should add the patch to 1.2 as well.

This is not really a gazebo style sensor, but a way to fill in data needed by the Atlas wrist and ankle force torque sensor in a model plugin. For real gazebo style force torque sensor, stay tuned to this ticket.
